name: Jurassic Survival- Lost Island
description:
Step into the era of Jurassic survival and come across jungle survival tasks and missions. Avail opportunities to make living in a wildlife jungle possible; face wild animals and dinosaurs, tame them, kill them with available weaponry. There might be other hunters in the jungle, the resources of survival are limited. Fight the hunters, to save yourself.
Enjoy amazing missions of crafting and building to get yourself a shelter and be able to enjoy the lay man luxuries in the open.

Game Features:
• Fight Dangerous Humongous Dinosaurs
• Craft Your Own House Fence
• Find Survival Weaponry From The Jungle
• Be The Lone Survivor
• Fight Other Animal Hunters
• 3D Graphics Of The Jungle
• Realistic Dinosaurs
• Absorbing Sound Effects
